-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | MIDI support for tidal
--   
@package tidal-midi
@version 0.0.1

module Sound.Tidal.VolcaKeys
channel :: Channel
keys :: OscShape
keyStream :: IO (OscPattern -> IO ())
note :: Pattern Int -> OscPattern
dur :: Pattern Double -> OscPattern
portamento :: Pattern Double -> OscPattern
expression :: Pattern Double -> OscPattern
octave :: Pattern Double -> OscPattern
voice :: Pattern Double -> OscPattern
detune :: Pattern Double -> OscPattern
vcoegint :: Pattern Double -> OscPattern
kcutoff :: Pattern Double -> OscPattern
vcfegint :: Pattern Double -> OscPattern
lforate :: Pattern Double -> OscPattern
lfopitchint :: Pattern Double -> OscPattern
lfocutoffint :: Pattern Double -> OscPattern
attack :: Pattern Double -> OscPattern
decay :: Pattern Double -> OscPattern
sustain :: Pattern Double -> OscPattern
dtime :: Pattern Double -> OscPattern
dfeedback :: Pattern Double -> OscPattern
keynames :: [String]
keyproxy :: Int -> String -> IO ()
sendmidi :: (AllowOutput mode, RealFrac b, RealFrac s) => Int -> T mode -> T -> (Word8, s) -> [b] -> IO ()
ctrlN :: Num t => [Char] -> t1 -> (t, t1)
noteOn :: T -> Word8 -> Word8 -> T
noteOff :: T -> Word8 -> T
makeCtrl :: T -> (Word32, Int32) -> T
